title: OSRS API
text: Possible values history latest, last90d, sample. ’s possible query several items latest option.
code: bucket_and_whip <- create_item_data(c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "all")  bucket_and_whip <- create_item_data(c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "latest")

what: Extracting information into a useful object
title: OSRS API
text: Use create_item_data function extract item information put data set. Fx. Filter data set
code: item_data <- create_item_data(c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "all") item_data |>    dplyr::filter(rel_day <= 10) #> # A tibble: 22 × 6 #>    item         id      price rel_day date       volume #>    <chr>        <chr>   <int>   <dbl> <date>      <int> #>  1 Abyssal whip 4151  1830704       0 2024-04-23   4730 #>  2 Abyssal whip 4151  1844101       1 2024-04-22   5006 #>  3 Abyssal whip 4151  1853530       2 2024-04-21  10618 #>  4 Abyssal whip 4151  1875130       3 2024-04-20   6541 #>  5 Abyssal whip 4151  1899375       4 2024-04-19   6332 #>  6 Abyssal whip 4151  1901588       5 2024-04-18   3676 #>  7 Abyssal whip 4151  1924803       6 2024-04-17   5471 #>  8 Abyssal whip 4151  1959491       7 2024-04-16   6509 #>  9 Abyssal whip 4151  1976147       8 2024-04-15  13050 #> 10 Abyssal whip 4151  1999665       9 2024-04-14   8021 #> # ℹ 12 more rows

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(osrsAPI) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Create a tibble of information with prices of requested item — create_item_data
title: Create a tibble of information with prices of requested item — create_item_data
text: function wrapper osrs_api() returns tibble easier work list object osrs_api function.

title: Create a tibble of information with prices of requested item — create_item_data
Create a tibble of information with prices of requested item — create_item_data
text: items character vector items history character type request. Default latest, also available user_agent character user agent

title: Create a tibble of information with prices of requested item — create_item_data
Create a tibble of information with prices of requested item — create_item_data
code: # Create a data set with information about the item create_item_data(items = "Abyssal_whip", history = "all") #> # A tibble: 3,247 × 6 #>    item         id      price rel_day date       volume #>    <chr>        <chr>   <int>   <dbl> <date>      <int> #>  1 Abyssal whip 4151  1830704       0 2024-04-23   4730 #>  2 Abyssal whip 4151  1844101       1 2024-04-22   5006 #>  3 Abyssal whip 4151  1853530       2 2024-04-21  10618 #>  4 Abyssal whip 4151  1875130       3 2024-04-20   6541 #>  5 Abyssal whip 4151  1899375       4 2024-04-19   6332 #>  6 Abyssal whip 4151  1901588       5 2024-04-18   3676 #>  7 Abyssal whip 4151  1924803       6 2024-04-17   5471 #>  8 Abyssal whip 4151  1959491       7 2024-04-16   6509 #>  9 Abyssal whip 4151  1976147       8 2024-04-15  13050 #> 10 Abyssal whip 4151  1999665       9 2024-04-14   8021 #> # ℹ 3,237 more rows  # Same can be done for other values of history create_item_data(items = c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "latest") |> create_item_data(items = c("Dragon dagger"), history = "sample") #> Error in purrr::map(items, osrs_api, history = history, user_agent = user_agent): ℹ In index: 1. #> Caused by error in `httr::user_agent()`: #> ! is.character(agent) is not TRUE

what: Get information about Grand Exchange prices of items in OSRS — osrs_api
title: Get information about Grand Exchange prices of items in OSRS — osrs_api
text: Use Weird Gloop API fetch information Grand Exchange prices Oldschool Runescape

title: Get information about Grand Exchange prices of items in OSRS — osrs_api
Get information about Grand Exchange prices of items in OSRS — osrs_api
text: items character vector items history character type request. Default latest, also available user_agent character user agent

title: Get information about Grand Exchange prices of items in OSRS — osrs_api
Get information about Grand Exchange prices of items in OSRS — osrs_api
code: # Get the latest prices of both a bucket and the abyssal whip bucket_and_whip <- osrs_api(items = c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "latest")  # Get the entire price history of the abyssal whip whip <- osrs_api(items = "Abyssal_whip", history = "all")

title: Print method for class — print.osrs_api
text: x object class osrs_api ... additional arguments passed methods

title: Print method for class — print.osrs_api
code: whip <- osrs_api(items = "Abyssal_whip", history = "latest") print(whip) #> <OSRS Weird Gloop API /exchange/history/osrs/latest?name=Abyssal_whip> #> List of 3 #>  $ content :List of 1 #>   ..$ Abyssal whip:List of 4 #>   .. ..$ id       : chr "4151" #>   .. ..$ timestamp: chr "2024-04-23T09:36:07.000Z" #>   .. ..$ price    : int 1830704 #>   .. ..$ volume   : int 4730 #>  $ path    : chr "/exchange/history/osrs/latest?name=Abyssal_whip" #>  $ response:List of 10 #>   ..$ url        : chr "character" #>   ..$ status_code: chr "integer" #>   ..$ headers    : chr [1:2] "insensitive" "list" #>   ..$ all_headers: chr "list" #>   ..$ cookies    : chr "data.frame" #>   ..$ content    : chr "raw" #>   ..$ date       : chr [1:2] "POSIXct" "POSIXt" #>   ..$ times      : chr "numeric" #>   ..$ request    : chr "request" #>   ..$ handle     : chr "curl_handle" #>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "osrs_api"
